thread.title: Tracy Morgan is launching a comedy tour
thread.title_full: Tracy Morgan is launching a comedy tour - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tracy Morgan is launching a comedy tour
text:
By Liz Raftery, Tracy Morgan is continuing his comeback by launching a full-scale stand-up tour next year.
Morgan announced the "Picking Up the Pieces" tour with a tweet on Tuesday, linking to a string of dates that includes an April Fool's gig at New York City's Madison Square Garden.
The tour kicks off on Feb. 5, 2016, in Hammond, Ind., and goes through May 28 in Westhamton Beach, N.Y. More dates will be announced soon, according to Morgan's website.
Heading back out on the road to bring the funny. Come see me: https://t.co/4fBhXf3CoB #pickingupthepieces
â€” Tracy Morgan (@RealTracyMorgan) October 20, 2015
Morgan sustained serious injuries in a crash on the New Jersey Turnpike in June 2014 and has only recently begun making public appearances. He was a surprise guest at the Emmys last month and hosted a star-studded Saturday Night Live last weekend. He's also slated to star alongside Ice Cube and Charlie Day in the upcoming Fist Fight and has an FXX comedy series in development.
Will you go see the "Picking Up the Pieces" tour? Check out the complete list of dates here .
